pkgmetadata.longdescription: An 'ohsome API' Client // A client that grants access to the power of the 'ohsome API' from R. It lets you analyze the rich data source of the 'OpenStreetMap (OSM)' history. You can retrieve the geometry of 'OSM' data at specific points in time, and you can get aggregated statistics on the evolution of 'OSM' elements and specify your own temporal, spatial and/or thematic filters.
